text: May I know what is bothering you?
I got fired from job, I am sad
I am sorry to hear that. It can be difficult to deal with job loss. What are some steps that you can take to help you move forward and find a new job?
I can take my brother's help
That's a great idea. Having the support and guidance of a family member can be incredibly valuable during this time. What do you think your brother can help you with in terms of finding a new job?
That's great! Do you think he can help you with creating a resume, identifying job openings, or providing advice on how to prepare for job interviews?
